mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(( SELECT sum(ifnull(visitor_cnt,0)) as tot_visitor_cnt FROM act_hist WHERE 1=1 AND work_ym between #{srch_str_ym} and #{srch_end_ym} ), 0) as tot_visitor_cnt , ifnull(( SELECT count(cmntor_no) as tot_cmmt_cnt FROM cmntor WHERE act_yn = 'Y' ), 0) as tot_cmmt_cnt

SELECT bs.sido_cd, (select sido_cd_nm from sido s where bs.sido_cd = s.sido_cd) as sido_cd_nm, bs.cmntor_cnt, ifnull(bs2.cmntor_update_cnt,0) as cmntor_update_cnt FROM (select sido_cd, count(cmntor_no) as cmntor_cnt from cmntor where act_yn = 'Y' group by sido_cd) bs left join ( SELECT a.sido_cd, count(b.seq) as cmntor_update_cnt FROM cmntor a join user_act_hist b on a.cmntor_no = b.cmntor_no and b.act_prt_cd like '2%' WHERE 1=1 AND convert(reg_tm, char(10)) between concat(#{srch_str_ym}, '-01') and concat(#{srch_end_ym}, '-31') GROUP BY a.sido_cd ) bs2 on bs.sido_cd = bs2.sido_cd

SELECT bs.sido_cd, ifnull( (select sido_cd_nm from sido s where bs.sido_cd = s.sido_cd), '비로그인') as sido_cd_nm, bs.user_cnt, bs2.login_cnt FROM (select ifnull(sido_cd,'00') as sido_cd, count(id) as user_cnt from user where (sido_cd != null or sido_cd != '') group by ifnull(sido_cd,'00')) bs left join ( SELECT ifnull(a.sido_cd,'00') as sido_cd, count(b.seq) as login_cnt FROM user a join user_act_hist b on a.id = b.id and b.act_prt_cd = '11' WHERE 1=1 AND convert(reg_tm, char(10)) between concat(#{srch_str_ym}, '-01') and concat(#{srch_end_ym}, '-31') GROUP BY ifnull(a.sido_cd,'00') ) bs2 on bs.sido_cd = bs2.sido_cd

select yyyy, concat(yyyy,'년') as yy from ( select convert(CURDATE(), char(4)) as yyyy union all select convert( CURDATE() - interval 1 year, char(4)) as yyyy union all select convert( CURDATE() - interval 2 year, char(4)) as yyyy union all select convert( CURDATE() - interval 3 year, char(4)) as yyyy union all select convert( CURDATE() - interval 4 year, char(4)) as yyyy union all select convert( CURDATE() - interval 5 year, char(4)) as yyyy union all select convert( CURDATE() - interval 6 year, char(4)) as yyyy union all select convert( CURDATE() - interval 7 year, char(4)) as yyyy union all select convert( CURDATE() - interval 8 year, char(4)) as yyyy ) bs

select ym, concat(replace(ym,'-','년'),'월') as yymm from ( select bs.n, convert(date_add(concat(ym, '-01'), interval bs.n month), char(7)) as ym from ( select (a.n*16 + b.n) as n from ( select 0 n union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9 union all select 10 union all select 11 union all select 12 union all select 13 union all select 14 union all select 15 ) a join ( select 0 n union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9 union all select 10 union all select 11 union all select 12 union all select 13 union all select 14 union all select 15 ) b ) bs join ( SELECT min(work_ym) as ym, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, concat(min(work_ym),'-01'), convert(curdate(),char(10) )) dif FROM act_hist ) c on bs.n <= c.dif ) tt order by n desc

select ym, concat(replace(ym,'-','년'),'월') as yymm from ( select bs.n, convert(date_add(concat(ym, '-01'), interval bs.n month), char(7)) as ym from ( select (a.n*16 + b.n) as n from ( select 0 n union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9 union all select 10 union all select 11 union all select 12 union all select 13 union all select 14 union all select 15 ) a join ( select 0 n union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9 union all select 10 union all select 11 union all select 12 union all select 13 union all select 14 union all select 15 ) b ) bs join ( SELECT work_ym as ym, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, concat(work_ym,'-01'), convert(curdate(),char(10) )) dif FROM (SELECT MIN(work_ym) as work_ym from act_hist where work_ym > '2010-01') bb ) c on bs.n <= c.dif ) tt order by n desc
